name: Whiteboarding Challenge Template
description:
Here's a template to prepare you for your next whiteboarding challenge! Get "unstuck" with these contextual and persona-related questions. Know how to organize your thoughts and insight just like in an extended design process. Organize your sketches according to your user flow! Your UX designer interviewer will be blown out of the water with this simple yet effective template!


Liked this template? Be sure to share this on LinkedIn and tag me!

  • This Figma file link: https://www.figma.com/community/file/1103069686131623436
  • My LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/adrianye


Want to support me? Please buy me a coffee here: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/adrianye

Thanks for viewing, liking, or duplicating!!
